content: Well Gloria Steinem is a typical feminist theorist; like a blind man in a dark room looking for a black cat that isn't there — and finding it. When you can, with a straight face, compare Playboy Magazine to the Holocaust, then you probably need to face the fact that you are mentally unstable. Poor Gloria spent most of her life tangling herself up in webs of contradictory anti-logic to rationalise the absolute nonsense she bequeathed to the hordes of wide-eyed automatons that now populate college campuses. It never seemed to occur to her that the mantra of the “patriarchy” she believed she was struggling against had always been — “Women and Children First!” “Housewives are dependent creatures who are still children — parasites.” Gloria Steinem:
